Package no.ntnu.fullstack.queues.authentication.jwt

Class JwtUtil

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.fullstack.queues.authentication.jwt.JwtUtil
@Configuration
public class JwtUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Abstracts the creation and decoding of JWTs.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    JwtUtil​(JwtConfig jwtConfig)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String cookieName()
    Returns name of cookie used for the refresh token
    java.lang.String createAccessToken​(java.lang.String subject)
    Creates access token with the configs defined in JwtConfig and adds the neccessary prefix to it
    java.lang.String createRefreshToken​(java.lang.String subject)
    Creates a refresh token for the given subject with the configurations given from JwtConfig

    Decodes a jwt with.

  • Constructor Details

    • JwtUtil

      public JwtUtil​(JwtConfig jwtConfig)

  • Method Details

    • createAccessToken

      public java.lang.String createAccessToken​(java.lang.String subject)
      Creates access token with the configs defined in JwtConfig and adds the neccessary prefix to it
      Parameters:
      subject - subject of jwt, in this case an email address
      Returns:
      jwt as string with given configurations

    • createRefreshToken

      public java.lang.String createRefreshToken​(java.lang.String subject)
      Creates a refresh token for the given subject with the configurations given from JwtConfig
      Parameters:
      subject - subject of jwt, in this case an email address
      Returns:
      jwt as string with the given configurations

    • decode

      public java.lang.String decode​(java.lang.String jwt) throws io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException
      Decodes a jwt with. If the token is expired, has been tampered with or is otherwise not trustworthy, the method will throw a JwtException.
      Parameters:
      jwt - Jwt
      Returns:
      Subject from the payload of the jwt. In this case it should be the email of the authenticated user
      Throws:
      io.jsonwebtoken.JwtException - this exception is thrown if the jwt is not trustable.

    • cookieName

      public java.lang.String cookieName()
      Returns name of cookie used for the refresh token
      Returns:
      name of cookie
